SQL.LOAD: SELECT product_code_id, effective_date, expiration_date, created_by, modified_by, created_date, modified_date, comm_p_code_id FROM elp_comm_p_code WHERE comm_p_code_id = :comm_p_code_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT cp.commission_period_id, d.dealer_name, cp.effective_date effective, cp.expiration_date expiration, c.code company_code FROM elp_dealer d , elp_commission_period cp, elp_company c WHERE D.company_id = c.company_id AND d.dealer_id like :dealer_id AND cp.dealer_id = d.dealer_id --dynamic_in_clause ORDER BY dealer_name, effective desc, expiration
SQL.MAX_EXPIRATION: select comm_p_code_id, to_char(EXPIRATION_DATE, 'DD-Mon-YYYY') EXPIRATION, sq.EXPIRATION_COUNT from elp_comm_p_code, (select Max(EXPIRATION_DATE) MAX_EXPIRATION, Count(*) EXPIRATION_COUNT from elp_comm_p_code where product_code_ID = :product_code_ID0 ) sq where product_code_ID = :product_code_ID1 and EXPIRATION_date = MAX_EXPIRATION
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_comm_p_code SET product_code_id = :product_code_id, effective_date = :effective_date, expiration_date = :expiration_date, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE comm_p_code_id = :comm_p_code_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_comm_p_code ( product_code_id, effective_date, expiration_date, created_by, comm_p_code_id ) VALUES ( :product_code_id, :effective_date, :expiration_date, :created_by, :comm_p_code_id )
